NI ACL Configuration Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

To access this dialog box from the Multiple Variable Editor window, double-click in the Security: ACL column of a network-published shared variable and select Configure.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • User or group names—Lists the users or groups for which you want to configure security settings.
  • Add—Displays the Add New User/Group/Host dialog box, which you can use to add users or groups to the User or group names list.
  • Remove—Removes the selected users or groups from the User or group names list.
  • Permissions—Displays the permission settings for the currently selected user or group.
  • Grant—Grants the selected user or group access to the selected permission in the Permissions table. If you do not specifically grant or deny a user permission, by default, the user is denied that permission.
  • Deny—Denies the selected user or group access to the selected permission in the Permissions table. If you do not specifically grant or deny a user permission, by default, the user is denied that permission.
